description: Sets the transition lifecycle of a recovery point. The lifecycle defines when a protected resource is transitioned to cold storage and when it expires. Backup transitions and expires backups automatically according to the lifecycle that you define. Resource types that can transition to cold storage are listed in the Feature availability by resource table. Backup ignores this expression for other resource types. Backups transitioned to cold storage must be stored in cold storage for a minimum of 90 days. Therefore, the 'retention' setting must be 90 days greater than the 'transition to cold after days' setting. The 'transition to cold after days' setting cannot be changed after a backup has been transitioned to cold. This operation does not support continuous backups.

parameters.name: BackupVaultName
parameters.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Amazon Web Services Region where they are created.

parameters.name: RecoveryPointArn
parameters.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

parameters.name: Lifecycle
parameters.description: The lifecycle defines when a protected resource is transitioned to cold storage and when it expires. Backup transitions and expires backups automatically according to the lifecycle that you define. Backups transitioned to cold storage must be stored in cold storage for a minimum of 90 days. Therefore, the 'retention' setting must be 90 days greater than the 'transition to cold after days' setting. The 'transition to cold after days' setting cannot be changed after a backup has been transitioned to cold. MoveToColdStorageAfterDays (integer) --- The number of days after creation that a recovery point is moved to cold storage. DeleteAfterDays (integer) --- The number of days after creation that a recovery point is deleted. This value must be at least 90 days after the number of days specified in MoveToColdStorageAfterDays. OptInToArchiveForSupportedResources (boolean) --- If the value is true, your backup plan transitions supported resources to archive (cold) storage tier in accordance with your lifecycle settings.

nested_params.name: MoveToColdStorageAfterDays
nested_params.description: The number of days after creation that a recovery point is moved to cold storage.

nested_params.name: DeleteAfterDays
nested_params.description: The number of days after creation that a recovery point is deleted. This value must be at least 90 days after the number of days specified in MoveToColdStorageAfterDays.

nested_params.name: OptInToArchiveForSupportedResources
nested_params.description: If the value is true, your backup plan transitions supported resources to archive (cold) storage tier in accordance with your lifecycle settings.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a backup vault; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:backup-vault:aBackupVault.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: Lifecycle
nested_items.description: The lifecycle defines when a protected resource is transitioned to cold storage and when it expires. Backup transitions and expires backups automatically according to the lifecycle that you define.

nested_items.name: MoveToColdStorageAfterDays
nested_items.description: The number of days after creation that a recovery point is moved to cold storage.

nested_items.name: DeleteAfterDays
nested_items.description: The number of days after creation that a recovery point is deleted. This value must be at least 90 days after the number of days specified in MoveToColdStorageAfterDays.

nested_items.name: OptInToArchiveForSupportedResources
nested_items.description: If the value is true, your backup plan transitions supported resources to archive (cold) storage tier in accordance with your lifecycle settings.

nested_items.name: CalculatedLifecycle
nested_items.description: A CalculatedLifecycle object containing DeleteAt and MoveToColdStorageAt timestamps.

nested_items.name: MoveToColdStorageAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp that specifies when to transition a recovery point to cold storage.

nested_items.name: DeleteAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp that specifies when to delete a recovery point.
